Engage in sustainability, conservation, and cultural experiences with solar-powered stages, art installations, workshops, and a curated flea market. Join the exclusive artist brunch for a chance to connect with your favorite performers. Get your tickets now for an unforgettable celebration with a larger message.

Don't miss this electrifying concert where the powerhouse of Indian music will showcase her unmatched vocal prowess and dynamic stage presence, promising an unforgettable evening filled with chart-topping hits and fan favorites. Secure your seats now for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to witness Sunidhi in action and make memories that will last a lifetime!

• Non-stop entertainment featuring live bands, percussionists, DJs, and dancers

🎟 Limited Tickets Available! Book your early bird passes now and get ready to dance the night away!

name: Asal Kolaar Live in Bangalore
about: Asal Kolaar, the talented Indian film singer and lyricist, has captivated audiences with popular songs like "Jorthale" and "Mustaache Vestaache". Catch him on the latest season of Bigg Boss Tamil, hosted by Kamal Haasan, as he continues to make waves in the music industry.

name: Chandan Shetty Live in Bangalore
about: Chandan Shetty, also known as "Kannada Rapper Chandan Shetty", is an Indian film score and soundtrack composer, lyricist, and singer known for his work in the Kannada language. He gained popularity for his music in movies like Alemari, Varadanayaka, Power, Chakravyuha, and Bhajarangi. Chandan Shetty also emerged as the winner of Bigg Boss Kannada Season 5, showcasing his talent and strong presence in the industry.

With Karaoke and a DJ set by Jonas Monterio, the energy will be high, and the music non-stop. It’s set to be a night of great tunes, drinks, and unforgettable moments — don’t miss out!
